_url: Pool url. Address prefix determines protocol used.

gpu._device: Select GPU by device id or name, set to null to auto detect.
gpu._work_multiplier: Specifies how much work to queue on gpu. Set to null for auto detect
gpu._work_size: Number of hashes per work thread. Larger should be better but there is greater delay until valid shares are submitted resulting in potential rejected shares

cpu._threads: Set amount of threads to run. -1 = auto detect thread count
